response.overview: Celestina Blooms, is on vacation for spring break, but she's feeling down because she recently broke up with her boyfriend. Her lesbian best friend, River Lynn, tries to get her to go out and have fun, but Celestina says she's definitely staying in because she already ordered pizza.  August Skye and Lana Smalls are packing up boxes one day when they stumble upon their old spirit board. They start recounting old memories of when they used to tempt the spirits with their supernatural shenanigans.  A couple, Rocky Emerson and Olivia Madison, and their friend, Robin Coffins, are getting ready to meet a fourth woman for a double date.
response.title: Try Something New!
